channel.title: CVE Feed for FON Wireless Limited -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FON Wireless Limited -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-6015|2024-08-04T20:16:23.652Z -- fon%20wireless%20limited -- fon2601e-se%2C%20fon2601e-re%2C%20fon2601e-fsw-s%2C%20and%20fon2601e-fsw-b
item.description: FON2601E-SE, FON2601E-RE, FON2601E-FSW-S, and FON2601E-FSW-B with firmware versions 1.1.7 and earlier contain an issue where they may behave as open resolvers. If this vulnerability is exploited, FON routers may be leveraged for DNS amplification attacks to some other entities.
